content: PBH SD Z Self-drilling drywall screws Single drywall screw (zinc-plated) for fastening drywall boards to metal ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Screws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Easy to drive thanks to excellent drilling characteristics Hilti has full control of the manufacturing process – delivering reliable, consistent quality Precisely matched to Hilti drivers and bits – helping to achieve high-quality fastenings every time All Hilti drywall drill-point screws meet or exceed ASTM C 954 performance requirements Applications Fastening drywall boards to metal studs (20-14 ga) Fastening hard boards to metal studs (20-14 ga) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Screw head type: Bugle head Screw drive/recess type: PH #2 Collated: No Technical Data | Screw head type | Bugle head | Screw drive/recess type | PH #2 | Collated | No | Drilling capacity -
